value.title: How quickly can REYNOR dispose of noobs? (Part 2) | Holdout Challenge - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: In part 2, the noobs are actually Grandmaster players but since they're not pros they're still considered noobs to Reynor.  We paid Reynor to 1v1 noobs in StarCraft 2. value.title: StarCraft 2: MASS Ghost Splits vs Banelings! - Never Attack to Grandmaster
value.excerpt: Welcome to the new Terran ladder series! This time, it's "Never Attack to Grandmaster!" In this challenge, I play as Terran on the EU ladder, and in every game I'm not allowed to attack with any units except for using Ghosts. I'm allowed to make any army units for defending, as long as I don't attack
